title: 1983 Grand Prix (tennis)
text:
The 1983 Volvo Grand Prix was a professional <a href="tennis">tennis</a> circuit held that year. It incorporated the four <a href="grand%20slam%20%28tennis%29">grand slam</a> tournaments, the <a href="Grand%20Prix%20tennis%20circuit">Grand Prix</a> tournaments, and two team tournaments (the <a href="Davis%20Cup">Davis Cup</a> and the <a href="World%20Team%20Cup">World Team Cup</a>. The circuit was administered by the <a href="Men%27s%20International%20Professional%20Tennis%20Council">Men's International Professional Tennis Council</a> (MIPTC).
